name: Fudge Nut Bars
steps: Cream together butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla. Add flour soda salt then stir in oats. Spray a 9 x 13 pan
Spread 2/3 of dough into the bottom of the pan.

Pour filling over the bar base. Then top with remaining dough. Press like puzzle pieces and place on top of filling til covered-leaving small spaces in between puzzle pieces of dough. Bake at 350 for 22-28 min or until lightly browned.
